baseline_texts: This frame shows an open refrigerator filled with various fresh produce, containers, bottles, and jars. On the left side is a kitchen countertop with a knife rack and some utensils, as well as a blue bowl. To the right, a young girl with a contemplative or curious expression is looking towards the fridge. The kitchen appears to be well-lit and organized.

The frame shows a kitchen scene where a refrigerator is open, revealing various food items inside, including bowls, containers, and produce such as apples. To the right, a young person with braided hair is standing and looking into the open fridge. The kitchen has wooden cabinets and a countertop with some kitchen utensils seen on the left side. The person appears to be considering what to take or just examining the contents of the refrigerator.

The image shows a young girl wearing a pink hoodie and a headband, standing in a kitchen. She is opening or reaching into a refrigerator that is filled with various food items. The kitchen has brown cabinets and a countertop with a blue bowl or container on it. The girl appears to be focused on the contents of the fridge.

The frame shows a young girl standing in a kitchen, opening the door of a refrigerator. She is wearing a pink long-sleeve top and a dark headscarf with a pattern. The refrigerator door has various magnets and papers attached to it. On the kitchen counter next to the refrigerator, there is a blue cooking pot. The kitchen cabinets are wooden and have a reddish-brown color. The scene appears to be indoors and well-lit.

The frame shows a person wearing a pink hoodie and a brown patterned headscarf opening a refrigerator door. The refrigerator has photos and magnets on it, including a child's photo and some other small colorful items. To the left of the refrigerator is a kitchen counter with a blue bowl and other kitchen items. The setting appears to be a kitchen.

The frame shows a young person wearing a pink hoodie and a patterned headscarf, standing in a kitchen. They appear to be reaching for or opening the handle of a silver refrigerator. On the refrigerator door, there are a few photos or pictures attached. The kitchen surroundings include wooden cabinets and a countertop with a blue bowl.

This frame shows a young person wearing a pink hoodie and a patterned headscarf, opening the door of a refrigerator in a kitchen. On the refrigerator door, there are some colorful children's drawings or photos attached with magnets. The kitchen has wooden cabinets and a blue bowl on the countertop. The overall setting appears to be a home kitchen environment.

In the image, a young girl wearing a pink hoodie and a patterned headscarf is reaching up to open the door of a silver refrigerator. The kitchen setting includes wooden cabinets and a counter with a blue bowl on it. The refrigerator door has various colorful papers and magnets attached to it. The girl appears focused on opening the refrigerator.
